lead_paragraph: A searing new public service announcement starring Michael B. Jordan, Danny Glover and Michael K. Williams takes on the issue of racial bias in police shootings with a simple message: "Black is not a weapon."

headline.main: Michael B. Jordan Stars in PSA Highlighting Racial Bias
headline.print_headline: Michael B. Jordan Stars in PSA Highlighting Racial Bias
